import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; const App = () => { const [input, setInput] = useState('') const handleButtonClick = (value)=>{ if(value === 'C'){ setInput('') } else if(value == '<'){ setInput(input.slice(0, -1)) } else if(value == '='){ setInput(eval(input).toString()) } else{ setInput((preValue) => preValue + value) } } return (

{input}

) } export default App
